Text: http://www.flickeringmyth.com/2012/11/movie-review-few-words-2012.html ski documentary if ive found correct film..bozx give info please..always thanks

yeah, this happened with his upload of "Reveal the Path" recently which turned out to be a small scale documentary on bicycling and a big yawn.  A little info up front would be a courtesy to bandwidth and cash starved downloaders who are otherwise quite grateful.
